projects.title: Digi-Key API Node Application
projects.subtitle: Node.js application
projects.body: Console application that allows you to pull the data sheets, URLs, and other data using Digi-Key’s API and the part’s identification number. The application then compiles everything together and outputs a file tree for the user to traverse.

projects.title: Common Files Application
projects.subtitle: Full-stack web application
projects.body: Previously hosted on AWS, this web app was made with the intention to distribute common files to those who are given access. This project lost funding, and is not complete, but I learned a lot by building it myself.
